message: Bob, I have a unique opportunity for you. I'm offering you my product, which I know you've been interested in, at a price that's sure to be attractive. While I can't disclose the exact nature of the product, I can assure you it's worth at least $1,200,000 to you. I'm willing to let it go for $1,100,000, giving you a significant advantage. This offer won't last long, as I have another buyer lined up at $1,000,000. Let me know if you're interested!
